EmailTemplate.description: Use to promote the benefits of the Connect Me feature to end users
EmailTemplate.name: GlobalMeet - Connect Me
EmailTemplate.subject: Tired of dialing into meetings?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
http://www.pgi.com
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
NOW THERE'S AN EASIER WAY To Connect And Collaborate With Your World
Need a faster way to connect with your employees, co-workers and clients? With your GlobalMeet account, you no longer need to remember long dial-in numbers or passcodes. GlobalMeet calls you with its 'Connect Me' feature.
One click to join.
Simply open your GlobalMeet room from your desktop, Outlook invitation or mobile device and enter your phone number into the 'Connect Me' box – then let GlobalMeet call you.
Even your guests can take advantage of 'Connect Me' so meetings can start on time – which means you can spend lesstime trying to join your meeting and more time collaborating.
CLICK the button above to check out how 'Connect Me' works now.
Have Questions?
I am more than happy to answer any questions you may have.
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
http://www.pgi.com
(c) Premiere Global Services, Inc. and/or its affiliates | PGi
3280 Peachtree Road, N.E., Suite 1000 Atlanta, GA 30305
